# norm_one(_:)

**Function**

Returns the sum of the absolute values of a vector.

## Declaration

```swift
func norm_one(_ x: SIMD4<Double>) -> Double
```

## Vector Norm Functions

- **norm_inf(_:)**: Returns the maximum absolute value of a vector.
